alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Charles; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:01PM EDT until June 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. MARYS...WEST CENTRAL CALVERT...CENTRAL CHARLES AND KING GEORGE COUNTIES... At 601 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Golden Beach to near King George, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... King George, Dahlgren, Prince Frederick, Nanjemoy Creek, Sheridan Point, Popes Creek, Hallowing Point, Port Tobacco River, Wicomico River, Golden Beach, Wicomico, Hughesville, Mechanicsville, Charlotte Hall, Cobb Island, Aquasco, Benedict, Rock Point, Bushwood and Issue. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
